examples.translation: 在合同中写入了一项罚款条款.
高明的律师也许能找到回避那一条款的办法.
examples.first: A clever lawyer might find ways of getting round that

n: (grammar) an expression including a subject and predicate but not constituting a complete sentence
a separate section of a legal document (as a statute or contract or will)
分句, 从句, 条款, 款项
